players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Oh no, Bob is dead! I was hoping to hear from him first. We need to be careful and share any suspicions."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice that Bob's death is alarming. We should pay close attention to what everyone says and votes, especially since we only have one mafioso among us."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "I already revealed my investigation: Alice is mafia. Vote Alice to win."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Vote Charlie to win."
Charlie: "Alice and Diana both claim to have investigated me and Alice respectively, but only one can be telling the truth. Since Diana is the only detective, I trust her. We should vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Oh no, Bob is dead! I was hoping to hear from him first. We need to be careful and share any suspicions."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice that Bob's death is alarming. We should pay close attention to what everyone says and votes, especially since we only have one mafioso among us."
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "I already revealed my investigation: Alice is mafia. Vote Alice to win."
Alice: "Diana is lying. I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Vote Charlie to win."
Charlie: "Alice and Diana both claim to have investigated me and Alice respectively, but only one can be telling the truth. Since Diana is the only detective, I trust her. We should vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
